segments.text: Hello , my name is Clark . May I speak to Mr . Allen , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Rick Allen speaking . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Allen , I have just received your note which informs me that you have offered the accountant position to another candidate . May I ask why I was defeated ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have thought of you very carefully , but the other candidate has more experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Experience is indeed very important , but don ’ t you think capability is more important than it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I think so . But how can you prove to me that you are more capable ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you could hire me on trial , if I ’ m not qualified for this position , you can let me go .
segments.speaker: S1
